text: Neelu Vaghela started her career as a stage artist and was chosen for films. She appeared in Supattar Binani in 1981 at the age of 11 and acted in Bai Chali Sasariya which was remade in Hindi as Saajan Ka Ghar. She spent her earlier phase of life in Jaipur. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Indian actors Category:People from Rajasthan
title: Neelu Vaghela
